hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Dodongo's Cavern is much easier and faster to clear as Adult.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Red Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Water Temple Boss Key# and #a Piece of Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Huge Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #generic grotto#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #0# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hookshot#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #the Mirror Shield#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

LH (Lab).text: When ASM is used to code a randomizer they should call it ASMR.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Compass# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Ice Cavern## has #0# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Bottom of the Well#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path First Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #the Nocturne of Shadow# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #grave with a free chest#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Piece of Heart#.
